name: agentic-coding-tools
description: Agentic coding toolkit: sub-agent orchestration, prompt synthesis, and browser automation for Claude Code

plugins.name: agentic-coding-tools
plugins.description: Complete agentic coding toolkit with skills for sub-agent orchestration (super-agent, cursor-agent, gemini-agent), prompt synthesis commands (handoff-prompt-to, pair-prompt-to, reflect, walkthrough-prompt-to), and specialized agents (browser-qa, ui-clone)
